title: Anything similar?
content:
Greetings...

I know that all you here know a lot about typefaces, so I need quick help regarding to this. I need to buy font that is similar to STAG ( [http://www.christianschwartz.com/stag.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423003813/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/stag.shtml "http://www.christianschwartz.com/stag.shtml"))...

Reason - STAG is very often used, so I need font similar to it, but rare...

Thx in advance

Mirko
author: super_mrki

comments.content:
How about Sumner Stone's [Silica](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423003813/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/stone/silica/)?

- Mike Yanega
Tnx for help bowfinpw... Silica is nice, but I imagine somehing different... Anyway, tnx for effort

Can you be more specific about what you are looking for? What is it about Stag that you like? Certain letters? Very heavy weight? Wide range of weights? When you say "rare", how obscure do you want? (Search small foundries for these)

Ole Schäfer has done a number of slab families, such as [Qugard Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423003813/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/qugard-slab/), but until I have some idea what you are looking for, it's hard to make recommendations.

- Mike Yanega

When I say rare, I mean that this type I'm looking for isn't used very offten in commercials and advertising in my country (Serbia). Now, I see that a few companies use STAG for adverts, so that's why I search for similar type, but not seen in our country...

I am designing a poster for wall, some kind of history diagram, with pictogramms as basic of communication, and this type to go along... Their logo is build from GIRL type ( [http://www.limundo.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423003813/http:/www.limundo.com/ "http://www.limundo.com/")), so I need type that would match GIRLS spike endings (I can't describe different what I mean)... I saw a post here, and someone mentioned GRUEBER from Dalton mag, and there I found FOCO and PLUME ADVERTISING that would go nice with GIRL from logo... So, I know that my post was boring so far, if you think anything that would go nicely with this, I would appreciate that...

Thanks anyway  
Mirko
